title: House for sale in Kadawatha.
details:
Highly residential and peaceful environment
Just 600 meters to kandy Road.
5 minutes away from Kadawatha highway entrance.
5 bed Room ( All room are A/C )
2 bath Room (Hot water available)
1 Servent Toilet
Clear deed.
Fully tiled.
Finishing Roof.
5.2 perch
